articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Italian Party Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Italian Party Delegation
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with a delegation of the Democratic Party of Italy headed by International Secretary Lapo Pistelli which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets Swedish, Bangladeshi Ambassadors
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets Swedish, Bangladeshi Ambassadors
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun separately met and had conversations with Swedish Ambassador to the DPRK Karl-Olof Andersson who paid a courtesy call on him and Bangladeshi Ambassador to the DPRK Munshi Faiz Ahmad who paid a farewell call on him Wednesday.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Message of Greeting from Brazilian Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Message of Greeting from Brazilian Party Leader
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting on Oct. 5 from Sergio Rubens De Araujo Torres, national president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil.
					 The message said the WPK and the Korean people are to celebrate the 67th birthday of the glorious WPK on Oct. 10, 2012.
					
					 On the occasion of the significant day, the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil shares joy with leader of the DPRK Kim Jong Un and the Korean people, said the message. 
					
					 It noted the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil is well aware that socialist Korea would always protect the sovereignty of the entire nation with Songun politics and become a bulwark for the struggle against U.S. imperialism.
					
					 The message reiterated the determination to deepen the friendly ties between the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil and the WPK and between the Brazilian people and the Korean people and firmly support the DPRK in its struggle to reunify the country in line with the proposal advanced by President Kim Il Sung, developed by leader Kim Jong Il and being maintained by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Russian Party Leader
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Russian Party Leader
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a congratulatory message from V.V. Zhirinovsky, chairman of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia, on Oct. 10.
					 The message extended congratulations to Kim Jong Un on the 67th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea, an event of great significance for the DPRK.
					
					 It said that thanks to the wise guidance of the WPK the DPRK has achieved great successes in building society based on the principle of the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and developed by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Under the leadership of Kim Jong Un the WPK is carrying out important tasks for improving the living standard of the citizens of the DPRK, developing the country's productivity and maintaining peace on the Korean Peninsula amid new historical circumstances, it noted.
					
					 It wished Kim Jong Un great success in his work to carry out all the plans put forth by the WPK and boost friendship and cooperation between Russia and the DPRK.

articles.title: Wreaths Sent to Cambodian Embassy
articles.content:
Wreaths Sent to Cambodian Embassy 
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Party and armed forces organs, ministries, national institutions and working people's organizations of the DPRK on Wednesday sent wreaths to the Cambodian embassy here in memory of Cambodian Great King Norodom Sihanouk.
					 Placed before the photo of the deceased were wreaths sent by the International Affairs Department of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, Ministry of People's Security, Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports, Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions and the General Bureau of Diplomatic Corps Affairs.
					
					 Present there were Kim Jong Gak, Kim Yong Il and officials concerned.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the deceased before making an entry in the mourners' book.

articles.title: Italian Party Delegation Flies Back Home
articles.content:
Italian Party Delegation Flies Back Home
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Democratic Party of Italy headed by International Secretary Lapo Pistelli flew back home Wednesday.

articles.title: Staff Members of Russian Embassy Tour Different Places
articles.content:
Staff Members of Russian Embassy Tour Different Places
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Alexandr Timonin and staff members of his embassy visited the National Gifts Exhibition House on Wednesday on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and the Russian Federation.
					 At the general hall of the house they made a bow before the full-length paintings of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They went round gifts presented to the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu by Korean people, overseas Koreans and south Korean people.
					
					 The ambassador wrote in a visitor's book that gifts on display show boundless reverence of all the Korean people for the leaders of the DPRK.
					
					 The guests toured the Ryongaksan Pleasure Park.

articles.title: Diplomatic Envoys Mourn Death of Cambodian Great King Norodom Sihanouk
articles.content:
Diplomatic Envoys Mourn Death of Cambodian Great King Norodom Sihanouk
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Diplomatic envoys, representatives of international organizations and staff members of foreign embassies here Tuesday and Wednesday visited the Cambodian embassy here to express deep condolences over the death of Cambodian Great King Norodom Sihanouk.
					They made an entry in the mourners' book.

articles.title: DPRK Delegate Calls for End to History of Individual States' Abuse of UN
articles.content:
DPRK Delegate Calls for End to History of Individual States' Abuse of UN
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The DPRK delegate made a speech at the meeting of the 6th committee of the 67th UN General Assembly on Oct. 12 when discussing a report of an ad hoc committee on increasing the role of the UN Charter and the organization.
					 Highhanded and arbitrary practices and double standards based on the theory of strength persist in international relations and the use of force, threat by it, interference in internal affairs of other countries, sanctions and other violations of sovereignty are getting evermore undisguised as the days go by. But proper measures are not taken against them and the UN is abused for justifying such practices, he said, and went on:
					
					 Typical of them is the fact that important pending issues are deliberately handled according to political purposes and interests of some specified states at the UN Security Council.
					
					 Illegal armed invasion and air raids of super powers against sovereign states and the resultant killings of civilians are connived whereas legitimate and peaceful measures of developing countries for protecting sovereignty and achieving development are considered as a threat to global peace and regarded as problematic. This is the reality today.
					
					 Attempts are going on to expand the authority of the UNSC to the issues irrelevant to global peace and security.
					
					 This consequently weakens the authority of the UN General Assembly which should speak for the will of all its member states and upsets equilibrium among major bodies of the UN and, moreover, creates confusion in the overall work of the UN.
					
					 It is necessary to take immediate measures to do away with such practices as abusing the principle and purpose of the UN Charter which stipulates the principle of respect for sovereignty, equality and non-interference of internal affairs of other countries.
					
					 To this end, the DPRK delegation is of the view that there should be a regime whereby the UNSC should be responsible for its work at the UNGA. 
					
					 He said the ad hoc committee should promptly discuss and settle some already submitted proposals and continue to work out new proposals so that it may make a tangible contribution to increasing the roles of the UN Charter and bodies including the UNSC reform.
					
					 It is prerequisite for increasing the roles of the UN Charter and bodies to put an end to the history in which the UN is abused by individual countries at present.
					
					 The "UN Command" in south Korea is typical of the abuse of the UN by an individual country.
					
					 Former UN secretary generals clearly testified to the fact that the command fabricated by the U.S. exists to command the U.S.-led army, not UN forces and the UN does not take any responsibility for political, military and financial matters.
					
					 The command is used as a tool for carrying out the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 Unless the command is dismantled, the UN cannot shake off the shame of being abused by the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK delegation strongly calls for dismantling the command without delay in line with the resolution of the 30th UNGA Session and put an earliest possible end to the history in which the UN is abused by individual nations.

articles.title: Formation of DIU Signals Independence in Korea's Revolution
articles.content:
Formation of DIU Signals Independence in Korea's Revolution
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- October 17 marks the 86th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU) formed by President Kim Il Sung.
					 The formation of the DIU signaled the start of the revolutionary cause of Juche in Korea.
					
					 Kim Il Sung began revolutionary activities in his early days, determined not to return to the homeland unless he liberated Korea from the Japanese colonial rule.
					
					 In June Juche 15 (1926), he entered Hwasong Uisuk School at the request of his father's friends. The school was founded by the Korean nationalists with a view to training cadets for the independence army.
					
					 During the school days, he had a new view of the nationalist movement. Regarding the nationalists' way of struggle as anachronistic, he tried to find out a new way.
					
					 While reading the Communist Manifesto and other revolutionary books, he studied the prevalent revolutionary principles in comparison with the Korean situation. At last, he came to have  belief that Korea's revolution should be made to get the Japanese imperialists out of the country and build a new society in which popular masses enjoy wellbeing. He also came to have an idea that all affairs should be judged and settled in an independent way and popular masses should be awakened and aroused to the struggle for independence.
					
					 On the basis of this belief, he formed the DIU, a vanguard organization of young communists of new generation, advancing the immediate tasks and ultimate object of the Korean revolution.
					
					 Since then, the Korean revolution has taken to the road of independence.

articles.title: Cuban Ambassador to DPRK Gives Reception to Mark WPK Birthday
articles.content:
Cuban Ambassador to DPRK Gives Reception to Mark WPK Birthday 
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Cuban Ambassador to the DPRK German Hermin Ferras Alvarez gave a reception at his embassy on Wednesday to mark the 67th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the WPK Central Committee, Vice Department Director Pak Kun Gwang and other officials of the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 German Hermin Ferras Alvarez said in his speech that the Korean people have achieved shining successes in the building of a thriving nation under the wise leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un and glorified the immortal revolutionary feats of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Cuban people will extend firm support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just efforts in the future, too, he noted, and went on:
					
					 The friendly relations between the parties and peoples of Cuba and the DPRK provided under the deep concern of the leaders of the two countries would further develop.
					
					 He sincerely hoped in the name of the Communist Party and the government of Cuba that the WPK will steadily grow.
					
					 Kim Yong Il said that the Cuban people have staged a dynamic struggle to carry out the decision made at the Sixth Congress of the Communist Party of Cuba. He noted:
					
					 We will invariably extend firm support and encouragement to the party and people of Cuba in their just struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country and the gains of the revolution.
					
					 The friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries provided by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il together with Fidel Castro Ruz and Raul Castro Ruz are developing on good terms under the deep concern of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He expressed belief that everlasting will be the friendly relations between the two parties and the two countries forged in the anti-imperialist and anti-U.S. struggle and the joint struggle for realizing the socialist cause.

articles.title: Chinese Embassy Officials Give Friendly Helping Hand
articles.content:
Chinese Embassy Officials Give Friendly Helping Hand
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Ambassador Liu Hongcai and staff members of the Chinese embassy here Wednesday helped the employees of the DPRK-China Friendship Thaekam Co-op Farm in Sunan District, Pyongyang in rice harvesting.
					 The ambassador hoped that the farmers would achieve greater success in agricultural production.
					
					 The staff members of the embassy handed over a certificate of donation of farming materials and aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: Title of DPRK Labor Hero Awarded to Officials, Soldiers and Working People
articles.content:
Title of DPRK Labor Hero Awarded to Officials, Soldiers and Working People
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The title of the DPRK Labor Hero and Gold Medal (hammer and sickle) and Order of National Flag First Class were conferred on Ra Yong Gak, Kang Song Il, Chang Jae Ryong, Song Yong Il, Ri Chang Ryong, Ra In Dok, Kim Myong Ryong, Paek Yong Ho and Kim Myong Chol. It was in recognition of their distinguished feats in erecting statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and building Changjon Street.
					 A decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK on it was made public on Oct. 13.

articles.title: Dredging of Pothong Riverbed Completed
articles.content:
Dredging of Pothong River Completed
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Service personnel of the Korean People's Army cleared the Pothong River of more than 788 000 cubic meters of sludge in a matter of six days as part of the project for face-lifting the river.
					 They were provided with necessary equipment and materials for carrying out the project and waged a socialist emulation.
					
					  The work sites were alive with frontline-style agitation. 
					
					 Commanding officers took the lead in carrying sludge, shouting the slogan "Follow Me!"
					
					 The soldiers carried out 42 percent of the total dredging quota on the first day of their dredging operation.
					
					 They brought about signal innovations every day through a high-pitched drive to put the intention of Supreme Commander of the KPA Kim Jong Un into practice.
					
					 Their completion of the dredging in the spirit of "At a go" opened up a prospect for carrying out the project much earlier than scheduled.
					
					 The Pothong River is taking on a new look with each passing day.

articles.title: Recovery Campaign Makes Brisk Headway in Flood-stricken Komdok Area
articles.content:
Recovery Campaign Makes Brisk Headway in Flood-stricken Komdok Area 
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- More successes have been made in the operations to recover from flood damage in the Komdok area in the DPRK.
					 Service members and builders are propelling the project for building a thousand and several hundreds of dwelling houses at the final stage.
					
					 The working people in South Hamgyong Province and under the Tanchon Area Mining General Bureau are effecting collective innovation in every work site and the people in the flood-stricken areas are helping the builders both materially and morally.
					
					 Wall-block assembling and plastering for one thousand and hundreds of dwelling houses were finished in a little over a month since the foundation work started, and roof covering and inside project are under way.
					
					 Preparations are being made to put the production on a normal footing, and roads and railways are being improved.
					
					 Nearly all plants in the area started production after removing almost all damage done to the production processes. The work to recover from flood damage done to the deep coal faces is still going on.
					
					 Servicepersons mobilized for the recovery of roads removed a tremendous quantity of earth and are carrying out such works as revetment, slope regulation and road-widening.
					
					 Thanks to the devoted efforts of railway officials and workers, the Kumgol-Taesin railway was reopened to the traffic.
					
					 The servicepersons and builders are accelerating the recovery drive in the high spirit to completely change the original appearance of the area.

articles.title: Papers Call for Glorifying Tradition of DIU
articles.content:
Papers Call for Glorifying Tradition of DIU
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Major newspapers of the DPRK Wednesday dedicate editorials to the 86th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU) formed by President Kim Il Sung.
					 The noble idea of DIU was to overthrow imperialism and build a new world for people.
					
					 The long history of the Korean revolution which started from DIU is a history which has advanced, guided by the idea of DIU and an immortal history in which the precious tradition to be held fast to by the Korean revolution was provided, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung made long journeys of bloody anti-Japanese battles, guided by the noble idea of DIU, and thus crushed brigandish Japanese imperialism, accomplished the historic cause of the country's liberation and built the country into a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence. The Korean revolution could dynamically advance along the straight road of victory as the idea of DIU was applied in all fields of revolution and construction from party building to building of armed forces, economy and culture.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il gave steady continuity to the tradition of DIU, regarding it as his lifelong mission to carry forward and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche. He ushered in a new era of history in which the whole party and society were imbued with Kimilsungism and laid a firm foundation for prosperity while adorning a heroic epic of the anti-imperialist struggle. Under his leadership the DPRK proudly emerged an invincible political, ideological and military power.
					
					 All victories and wealth gained in the Korean revolution would be unthinkable without the tradition of DIU.
					
					 The faith in independence enshrined in the hearts of the service personnel and people of the DPRK stemmed from the roots of DIU. The single-minded unity, the invincible might of Korean-style socialism, is based on the spirit of DIU and the idea and principle adhered to by the DPRK are also based on the idea of DIU.
					
					 It is the steadfast will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to dynamically advance toward the eminence of socialism, holding aloft the red party flag of Juche associated with the idea of DIU as the colors of revolution.
					
					 Minju Joson calls on all service personnel and people to struggle more staunchly for the final victory of the cause of building a thriving socialist nation and the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, more loudly singing the song "Fly High, Our Party Flag" as the march of the era.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed 
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday dedicates a bylined article to the 30th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is a Juche-Type Revolutionary Party Which Inherited the Glorious Tradition of the DIU."
					 The work clarifies principled issues arising in developing the WPK into an eternal Juche-type revolutionary party.
					
					 The banner of independence, unity and Songun held aloft by the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU) serves as an eternal banner of the WPK for victory.
					
					 The principle of independence laid down by DIU serves as the eternal revolutionary one of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The WPK has shaped its line and all its policies from the creative and independent stand and wisely led the work to firmly maintain the Juche character and national identity in all fields of revolution and construction.
					
					 It is thanks to the leadership of the WPK struggling under the uplifted banner of independence that there emerged on this land a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence, and the international prestige of the country has remarkably grown.
					
					 It is the invariable political creed of the WPK that an independent stand represents justice, truth and victory.
					
					 The single-minded unity which traces back to DIU and has steadily been consolidated in the whole historical course of revolution has always served as a revolutionary philosophy of the WPK.
					
					 The DIU tradition of the unity centering on the leader has been firmly inherited in the whole historical course of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The single-minded unity of the DPRK is the most solid unity formed on the basis of the blood ties of the leader, the party and masses and based on the monolithic idea.
					
					 The revolutionary ranks of the DPRK represent an integral whole of the party, army and people united close around the leader in thinking and purpose and in terms of morality and sense of obligation.
					
					 The course of Songun first covered by DIU is the ever-victorious one to be always followed by the WPK.
					
					 The idea of the anti-imperialist struggle of DIU is fully embodied in the Songun policy of the WPK.
					
					 The policy thoroughly embodies the idea of attaching importance to army and military affairs which has been steadily inherited generation after generation. The policy is an ever-victorious political mode whose validity and vitality were fully proved in the fierce class struggle against imperialism.
					
					 The WPK will achieve the victory of DPRK-style socialism, destroying the stronghold of the enemies with arms of Songun under the uplifted red banner of DIU.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Praises Feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for Party Building
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Praises Feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for Party Building
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il provided the Koreans and other world people with a key to the victory of socialism.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Regarding it as a fundamental issue for the victory of the revolution to build a political party since he embarked upon the road of the revolution, Kim Il Sung energetically led the work for the preparations for building the party. He made these preparations, finding himself among the people with firm belief that they are responsible for the revolution. He laid the foundation for party building by training genuine revolutionaries among the people and organizing basic party bodies.
					
					 Ranks of core elements of the party grew up in the crucible of the hard-fought anti-Japanese armed struggle and achieved unity and cohesion in thinking and purpose centering on the leader.
					
					 The undying feats and precious experience gained by Kim Il Sung in developing the Juche-based theory of party building and in building the party served as a firm foundation and guarantee for steadily developing the Workers' Party of Korea into the revolutionary party of Juche type.
					
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into a revolutionary party that takes its roots deep among the popular masses.
					
					 Kim Jong Il published famous works such as "On the Fundamentals of Revolutionary Party Building" and "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" in the 1990's when ruling parties were degenerated in some socialist countries and socialism collapsed. The works gave correct answers to all theoretical and practical issues arising in the revolutionary party building and activities. They serve as precious guidelines for the revolutionary parties in performing their missions and roles despite complicated situation.
					
					 The WPK is dynamically advancing along the road of socialism while conducting party building and activities under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, holding Kim Il Sung in high esteem as its eternal leader and Kim Jong Il as its eternal general secretary.

articles.title: "Education" Aimed at "Eliminating Forces Following North" in S. Korea Slammed
articles.content:
"Education" Aimed at "Eliminating Forces Following North" in S. Korea Slammed
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- It was recently disclosed that the south Korean "Ministry of Defense" distributed to all units a "teaching program on the standard action against forces following the north" under the signboard of the "establishment of outlook on the principal enemy and security", sparking off great public furor. 
					 This is aimed to label organizations and progressive forces calling for independence, democracy and reunification of the country "forces posing security threat and following the north, pursuant to the north's strategic line against the south," and define them as the "enemy".
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The distribution of the program brought to light the sinister intention of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to stir up the "outlook on the principal enemy" among the service members of the puppet army and thus hurl officers and men into escalating the north-south confrontation and igniting a war against the north. 
					
					 It is as clear as noonday why the south Korean military conceived such disturbing teaching material with the "presidential election" at hand.
					
					 The military which is in league with the conservative group is working hard to crack down upon the progressive forces by linking them with the DPRK in a bid to enable the "presidential candidate" from "the Saenuri Party" to garner faggot votes from officers and men of the army.
					
					 The education farce is nothing but the last-ditch efforts of those who are fated to meet destruction. The desperate efforts of the Lee group to escape a miserable end through the influence of the military would get it nowhere. The Lee group should bear in mind that with nothing can it escape the fate of doom already sealed.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Lee Myung Bak's Remarks for Confrontation with Fellow Countrymen
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Lee Myung Bak's Remarks for Confrontation with Fellow Countrymen
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- In a recent "policy speech at the National Assembly" traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea let loose a spate of invectives that nuclear and missile development of the north is intolerable. At a party with riff-raffs of the "Association of Reservists" at Chongwadae he vociferated about "opening", calling the DPRK a "belligerent rival".
					 Minju Joson Wednesday in a bylined commentary says in this regard:
					
					 This was the last-ditch effort of the confrontation maniac, a politician more dead than alive, who is steeped in hostility toward fellow countrymen to the marrow of their bones.
					
					 Lee, who has been intent on the moves for confrontation and war from the outset of his office, malignantly slandered the DPRK again only to fully reveal his true colors as a confrontation maniac. His accusations against the DPRK were aimed to incite confrontation with fellow countrymen, escalate the tension and thus offer the "Saenuri Party" an opportunity for staying in power. His sinister scheme was to make the conservative forces take power and secure his safety after retirement. That is why he has become all the more frantic in his moves for confrontation with fellow countrymen as his term of office is coming to a close.
					
					 His frantic moves for escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen aimed at prolonging his dirty remaining days will only heighten the hatred and resentment of the people, and the traitor will not be able to avoid the merciless punishment by the service personnel and people of the DPRK.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Terms Revival of "Yusin" Dictatorship Betrayal of History and People
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Terms Revival of "Yusin" Dictatorship Betrayal of History and People
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- 33 years have passed since there was the resistance for democracy in Pusan and Masan in south Korea in 1979 (October resistance for democracy).
					 The fiercest resistance after the April 19 popular uprising in 1960 and the June 3 actions in 1964 was an expression of the south Korean people's will to end the "yusin" fascist rule and realize the democratization of society and the reunification of the country.
					
					 The torch of the April 19 popular uprising that flared up in Masan resulted in the ruin of traitor Syngman Rhee. The flame was kindled again in the same area in 1979. This struck the U.S. imperialists and their stooge "yusin" dictator to horror and encouraged south Koreans to renewed actions.
					
					 Their strenuous actions culminated in the end of "yusin" fascist dictator Park Chung-Hee on October 26, 1979.
					
					 Scores of years have passed since the resistance but there still go on sordid moves to call back the departed soul of the "yusin" dictator in south Korea.
					
					 The "presidential" candidate from the "Saenuri Party" who defended the May 16 military coup and "yusin" dictatorship as an inevitable "historical option" has recently asserted that it was unavoidable to deter the north's "threat of southward invasion" and defend "security".
					
					 It is quite natural that all people were shocked by the shamelessness of the candidate who pulled up others for the revival of the "yusin" dictatorship.
					
					 This amounts to an open declaration that when they come to power they will keep trumpeting "threat of southward invasion" and "provocation by the north", a trite method used for fascist suppression during the period of the "yusin" dictatorial rule.
					
					 The south Koreans suffered from the fascist rule by the "yusin" dictator who was vocal about the non-existent "threat of southward invasion".
					
					 During the 18-year tenure of office of Park Chung-Hee, a total of 14 million innocent people were arrested, thrown into prison or killed, 700 000 to 800 000 on an annual basis.
					
					 A number of south Koreans were subject to whole gamut of persecution and suppression and were forced to meet deaths at home and abroad. A typical example is a politician of an opposition party who was kidnapped abroad in broad daylight and was almost thrown into the sea. 
					
					 South Korea was a barren land devoid of genuine politics, democracy, civil rights and freedom of speech under the "yusin" dictatorial rule.
					
					 How can the shuddering nightmare under the "yusin" rule be forgotten and how can its crimes against south Korean society and its people be pardoned despite the lapse of many years?
					
					 The revival of the "yusin" dictatorship is a betrayal of history and the people.
					
					 In case the "yusin" dictatorship is allowed to come back, this will fuel the fascistization of south Korean society and escalate north-south confrontation and the danger of a nuclear war.
					
					 The south Koreans should not be taken in by the "Saenuri Party's" crafty trick and never allow the revival of the second "yusin" dictatorship.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams "Saenuri Party's Presidential Candidate" for Defending "Yusin System"
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams "Saenuri Party's Presidential Candidate" for Defending "Yusin System"
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The "Saenuri Party" of south Korea has become all the more persistent in its moves for defending the "yusin system".
					 The "presidential candidate" from the "Saenuri Party" who drew criticism for defending the "yusin" dictatorial period again described the "yusin system" as an unavoidable option for "people's welfare" at a press conference for making an apology on September 24.
					
					 The moves of the "Saenuri Party" for defending the "yusin" system even after the lapse of four decades since the fabrication of the "October yusin" are aimed to bring back the dictatorial era that earned ill-fame for deteriorating people's livelihood.
					
					 The "October yusin" was a political coup which traitor Park Chung-Hee perpetrated by abusing "Meiji Restoration", that was effected in Japan in 1868 by bourgeois reformists, in a bid to establish long-term dictatorial system.
					
					 Park massively introduced foreign capital under the spurious signboards of "industrial modernization" and "economic development" and enacted lots of evil laws.
					
					 He accordingly provided foreign monopoly capitals with all kinds of preferential treatment and privileges and legally banned the formation of trade union and the staging of labor strife by workers employed by foreign businesses.
					
					 This allowed the foreign capitals to find their ways to south Korea and plunder it unhindered, bringing south Korea's economy down.
					
					 Park set up an economic system dominated by a handful of big businesses, making a number of minor businesses bankrupt and impoverishing people's life.
					
					 If there were anything that surged in the south Korean economy it was the astronomic amount of foreign debt, degree of colonial dependence and practices of all kinds of corruption and irregularities. South Korea also experienced an increasing gap between the rich and the poor and the staggering jump in the number of the unemployed.
					
					 The "yusin system" ruined south Korea's economy and people's livelihood.
					
					 The persistent defence of the "yusin system" by the "presidential candidate" from the "Saenuri Party" in disregard of public condemnation is little short of a declaration to bring back the infamous "yusin" dictatorial era.
					
					 "Economic policy" allegedly calling for "democratization of economy", "improvement of welfare" is just a whopping lie.
					
					 The south Koreans will never pardon the group of conservative traitors who seek to mock at the life of the people while defending the "yusin system".

articles.title: Deceptive Nature of Jeju Naval Base Construction Disclosed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Deceptive Nature of Jeju Naval Base Construction Disclosed in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The Kangjong Village Society, the All-Islanders Measure Committee for Checking the Military Base on Jeju Island and the Measure Committee for Checking the Construction of Jeju Naval Base in south Korea made public a joint statement on Oct. 11 in demand of the stop to the project for Jeju naval base.
					 The statement referred to the fact that the minutes of the technical inspection committee under the "prime minister's" office were opened to the public through media including the paper Hangyore.
					
					 The minutes contain views on a serious problem in designing and simulation of the naval base and the point that Kangjong Village is not appropriate for housing a harbor, the statement said, adding:
					
					 Nevertheless, the "prime minister" pushed ahead with the construction, saying the basic agreement on naval base was concluded and the "government" is responsible for its implementation.
					
					 The authorities and military deceived the people with such bait as the entry of civilian ships, though the construction is mainly military oriented.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak regime and military should stop the construction at once and no longer make the mockery of the people.

articles.title: Drug Smuggling by GIs in S. Korea on Steady Increase
articles.content:
Drug Smuggling by GIs in S. Korea on Steady Increase 
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The drug smuggling by the U.S. imperialist aggression forces present in south Korea has shown dramatic increase this year, according to south Korean KBS on Oct. 15.
					 A lawmaker revealed the fact through the "National Assembly's" inspection of the customs office.
					
					 GIs smuggled a large amount of drug into south Korea by using their military mail as a route.
					
					 What drew attention is that the quantity of drug seized between Jan. and Sept. this year is 7.7 times as much as that in the past one year alone.
					
					 That is enough for dosing out over 57 000 people at a time.
					
					 This fact clearly showed that GIs are the root cause and chieftain of the drug-related crimes rampant in south Korea.

articles.title: Koreans in China Support Statement Issued by Spokesman for NDC of DPRK
articles.content:
Koreans in China Support Statement Issued by Spokesman for NDC of DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The Liaoning Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China made public a statement titled "We will surely achieve national reunification together with all service personnel and people in the homeland by wiping out aggressors and traitors" on Oct. 11.
					 The statement fully supported the statement issued by a spokesman for the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK in condemnation of the reckless "missile guidance agreement" announced by the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea.
					
					 It branded the "missile guidance agreement" as a declaration of preemptive attack on the DPRK, an undisguised provocative move to launch an all-out war and a thrice-cursed action.
					
					 The moves to extend the missile range are a product of conspiracy between the Lee regime, keen to stand in confrontation with the DPRK to the last, and the U.S. working hard to carry out its Asia-Pacific strategy for aggression, it noted, adding:
					
					 The announcement of the agreement indicates that the U.S. and its puppet forces' preparations for a preemptive attack on the DPRK have entered the phase of full-scale implementation. 
					
					 The Lee regime is persisting in its moves to ignite a new, reckless war to prolong its dirty remaining days and stay in power. This situation proves once again that the DPRK was entirely just when it built tremendous capability for dealing deadly blows including nuclear deterrent for self-defence under the banner of Songun.
					
					 The Lee regime of pro-U.S. fascist confrontation maniacs is bound to meet a miserable end and national reunification, the cherished desire of the nation, is sure to come true thanks to the service personnel in the homeland of Songun ready to take revenge upon the enemy.

articles.title: Korean-Chinese Call for Campaign against U.S. and S. Korean Regime
articles.content:
Korean-Chinese Call for Campaign against U.S. and S. Korean Regime
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Cha Sang Bo, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China, in a statement on Sunday stroke out at the U.S. and the south Korean regime for moving to provoke a war against the DPRK.
					 The new "missile guidance agreement" recently announced by the Lee Myung Bak regime in league with the U.S. is a challenge to the desire of all Koreans for genuine peace of the Korean Peninsula, and a declaration of a preemptive attack on the DPRK, said the statement.
					
					 It denounced the undisguised provocations for igniting a war.
					
					 It termed Lee Myung Bak a traitor and war maniac without equals as he has resorted to confrontation with fellow countrymen and provocations for a nuclear war, staking his fate on outsiders in disregard of the peace and reunification of the peninsula.
					
					 The lesson the Koreans once again have drawn is that only when they wipe out the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean group of traitors is it possible to achieve durable peace of the peninsula and reunification of the country, the long-cherished desire of the Koreans, the statement said, adding: We will turn out as one in the campaign against the U.S. and the south Korean regime together with the people in the homeland.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak, Wicked Enemy of Nation: Overseas Koreans' Organization
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak, Wicked Enemy of Nation: Overseas Koreans' Organization
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Korean Nationals in Russia issued a statement on Oct. 11 denouncing the U.S. and south Korean authorities for their moves to ignite a new war.
					 Recalling that the south Korean puppet regime announced the "missile guidance agreement", the statement said: 
					
					 This is an official declaration for a preemptive attack on the DPRK and an undisguised provocation to unleash an overall war.
					
					 After taking office traitor Lee Myung Bak has brought the situation to the brink of war through military exercises against the DPRK almost every day while raising a hue and cry over "unification under liberal democracy". The "missile guidance agreement" against this backdrop proves that Lee is, indeed, a shock brigade without equals for realizing the U.S. imperialists' strategy to dominate the Asia-Pacific region, a war maniac intent on igniting a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula and the wicked enemy of the nation. 
					
					 We fully support the statement of a spokesman for the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					
					 We will conduct the more positive movement against the moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet regime aimed at unleashing a new war on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as General Secretary of WPK Marked in Brazil, Germany
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as General Secretary of WPK Marked in Brazil, Germany
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- A Brazilian organization and a German travel company posted articles on their Internet websites on Oct. 8 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK in an article titled "Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea" praised Kim Jong Il who unrolled a plan for building a thriving socialist nation and remarkably increased the country's overall national power with his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 True to Kim Jong Il's calls for looking out at the world with feet firmly planted in one's own land and the WPK's idea of pushing back the frontiers of the latest science and technology, the Korean people have registered signal achievements in different fields including CNC, nuclear, outer space and bio-engineering technologies, the article said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il, who loved the people very much and shared weal and woe with them, passed away aboard a train during his field guidance of high intensity.
					
					 The Korean people hold him in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the WPK as he developed it into an ever-victorious revolutionary party and protected the country's dignity and sovereignty.
					
					 The MC Travel Company of Germany said in an article titled "Kim Jong Il's patriotism":
					
					 Kim Jong Il the Korean people hold in high esteem as their eternal leader was a genuine paragon of patriots.
					
					 The total dedication made by him to the building of the DPRK into a thriving nation clearly proves his warm and noble patriotism.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's patriotism serves as a beacon and a compass leading the Korean people to true patriotism.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Observed in Different Countries
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Observed in Different Countries
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of different countries carried articles on the occasions of the 15th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 67th anniversary of the WPK.
					 The articles praised the exploits performed by the peerlessly great men.
					
					 The Egyptian newspaper Al-Misaiya on Oct. 6 said that President Kim Il Sung pioneered the socialist cause in the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Jong Il set forth a gigantic plan for building a thriving socialist nation and wisely led the struggle of the army and people, remaining loyal to the President's idea and cause, it noted, adding:
					
					 The Korean people will accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche generation after generation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The Uruguayan newspaper La Juventud on Oct. 6 noted that the WPK regards the immortal Juche idea as its guiding idea and the whole party is united in one thought and one purpose, enjoying absolute support and trust from the popular masses.
					
					 The Bangladeshi newspaper Natun Bangla on October 5 in an article titled "Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea" said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il formulated the original Songun politics as a basic political mode under socialism in order to increase the country's political, ideological and military might and frustrate the imperialists' moves for aggression.
					
					 It was thanks to his leadership that the DPRK's national power rapidly increased and it had access to nuclear deterrent.
					
					 Today the Korean people entirely entrust their destiny and future to the WPK headed by Kim Jong Un, absolutely supporting and trusting him.

articles.title: Anniversary of WPK Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of WPK Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Mongolia and Bulgaria and round-table talks in Ethiopia between Sept. 30 and Oct. 9 on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present at the events were personages of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, Literary College of Mongolia, Kim Il Sung Library in Sofia, an enterprise and a hospital in Ethiopia and masses.
					
					 The chief of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Literary College of Mongolia praised President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for having successfully led the Korean people's socialist construction.
					
					 An acting chief of the Kim Il Sung Library in Sofia sincerely wished the Korean people greater success in their struggle for the building of a thriving nation and national reunification under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A department director of an enterprise in Ethiopia said that the WPK would make a more victorious advance under the leadership of Kim Jong Un and the DPRK would eternally prosper.
					
					 A message of greeting to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting held in Bulgaria.

articles.title: WPK Praised by Egyptian Political Party
articles.content:
WPK Praised by Egyptian Political Party
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The Arab Socialist Party of Egypt issued a statement on Oct. 10, the 67th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 October 10 is a holiday common to not only the Korean people but the world progressive political parties and people desirous of progress, justice and socialism, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The WPK has a history in which it has won victories only in the course of protracted and arduous struggle for independence, sovereignty and socialism and worked such miracle as building a country for the people in a shortest span of time by believing in the people's strength and relying on them.
					
					 These victories are associated with the shining exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, eternal leaders of the DPRK.
					
					 Availing ourselves of this opportunity, we express conviction that the relations with the WPK will steadily grow on the road of independence against imperialism.
					
					 We hope that only victory and glory are always in store for the WPK holding higher the banner of Songun and socialism under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Nigerian Organization Hails History of WPK
articles.content:
Nigerian Organization Hails History of WPK 
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea on Oct. 4 posted on its Internet homepage an article titled "86th Anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union".
					 The article said:
					
					 DIU was the first revolutionary vanguard organization formed by President Kim Il Sung in Korea.
					
					 He formed DIU on Oct. 17, 1926 with young revolutionaries with whom he shared will.
					
					 Under his leadership the Korean revolution that originated from DIU dynamically advanced along the road of independence, Songun and unity.
					
					 The article introduced in detail the immortal feats performed by Kim Il Sung in building a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence in Korea by firmly maintaining the independent stand in the whole course of the revolutionary struggle.
					
					 Songun is an invariable banner of the Korean revolution as it fully embodied the DIU's idea of anti-imperialist struggle, the article noted, and went on:
					
					 Unity is the mainstay of the Korean revolution which DIU set forth as the truth for winning steady victories.
					
					 DIU considered unity as a lifeline and made a new history of unity and cohesion around the leader.
					
					 The DPRK turned into a big and harmonious socialist family where all service personnel and people help and lead each other along after forming the harmonious whole with the leader.
					
					 Only victory and glory are always in store for socialist Korea dignified with independence, powerful with Songun and invincible with its single-minded unity.

articles.title: Anniversary of WPK Marked in Austria
articles.content:
Anniversary of WPK Marked in Austria
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna issued a special bulletin on Oct. 10, the 67th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 It carried an article titled "The 67th anniversary of the Workers' Party Korea" illustrated with a photo of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung led the anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory, accomplishing the historic cause of the country's liberation on August 15, 1945, the article said, adding:
					
					 He founded the WPK on Oct. 10, 1945.
					
					 It was thanks to the birth of the WPK, a revolutionary party, that the Korean people could eradicate the leftover of the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule and successfully carry out the anti-imperialist, anti-feudal democratic revolution.
					
					 The WPK fully embodied the Juche idea founded by Kim Il Sung in all fabrics of social life, taking it as the guiding idea.  His demise on July 8, 1994 was a great loss to all the Korean people and the world progressives.
					
					 However, the party and the people of the DPRK successfully concluded the Arduous March under the Songun leadership of the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Korean people are holding him in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the WPK and highly praising his undying feats.
					
					 The WPK will propel the building of a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Korean people will dynamically advance along the road of victory under the leadership of the WPK, holding high the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korean "Missile Guidance Agreement" under Fire in Peru
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korean "Missile Guidance Agreement" under Fire in Peru
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued a statement on Oct. 11 condemning the U.S. for letting south Korean puppet forces extend the missile range to attack the DPRK.
					 The statement recalled that the U.S. imperialists recently paved the south Korean puppet forces' way for developing new type ballistic missiles as part of its scenario for a war against the DPRK, and the south Korean Lee Myung Bak group of traitors made public "a missile guidance agreement" based on it.
					
					 It is generally known that the U.S. imperialists provided the south Korean puppet army with huge quantities of military hardware to invade the DPRK, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The "agreement" is aimed at mounting a preemptive attack on the DPRK and igniting a new war from A to Z. It is another evidence that clearly proves the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces' ambition for aggression. 
					
					The U.S. imperialists are providing huge quantities of modern destructive weapons to the south Korean puppet army. They, however, should bear in mind that the Korean People's Army is equipped with deterrent powerful enough to wipe them out at a blow.
					
					 The army and the people of the DPRK will foil all provocations of war-like forces, firmly defend socialist Korea and surely win a final victory in the sacred war for national reunification.
					
					 The statement resolutely rejected the U.S.-south Korea "missile guidance agreement" and expressed full support for the statements made by spokesmen for the DPRK National Defence Commission, the DPRK Foreign Ministry and the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in condemnation of the agreement.

articles.title: Constellation Drawn by Koguryo People in Japan
articles.content:
Constellation Drawn by Koguryo People in Japan
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- There is Kitora ancient tomb in Nara Prefecture, Japan, believed to be built in the latter half of the 7th century or early in the 8th century.
					 Some years ago, a chart marked with more than 600 stars and 34 constellations was discovered there. Japanese scholars admitted that it was the same with the constellation above Pyongyang.
					
					 At that time, the people of Koguryo Kingdom (B.C. 277-A.D. 668) achieved a big success in astronomy research. It is well illustrated in tomb murals dating back to Koguryo Kingdom, which picture asterism, including the Great Bear.
					
					 Asterism drawn on the ceiling of Kitora tomb is the one seen from Korea at 39 degrees north latitude, not from Japan or China. Pyongyang, which was the capital city of Koguryo, is located at the 39 degrees north latitude.
					
					 A Japanese space archaeologist confirmed the location of the constellation with planisphere of Chonsangryolchabunyajido (astronomical chart) of Medieval Korea.
					
					 The chart was mapped out in 1395 on the basis of astronomical chart carved on a stone in Koguryo period. The stone chart pictures 1 467 stars in 282 constellations in a circle, which could be viewed in Pyongyang at that time.
					
					 Thus, Koreans made a big contribution to the development of science in the East including Japan.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con la delegacion de PDI
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con la delegacion de PDI
						
Pyongyang, 17 de octubre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio el dia 17 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con la delegacion del Partido Democratico de Italia presidida por su secretario internacional Lapo Pistelli, que le hizo una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Extranjeros en Corea expresan condolencias en embajada camboyana
articles.content:
Extranjeros en Corea expresan condolencias en embajada camboyana 
						
Pyongyang, 17 de octubre (ACNC) -- Los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises, los delegados de las organizaciones internacionales y los miembros de las sedes diplomaticas, acreditados en Corea, visitaron los dias 16 y 17 la embajada de Cambodia en Corea para expresar condolencias por el deceso del gran rey de Cambodia, Norodom Sihanouk.
					Los visitantes dejaron letras en el libro de condolencias.

articles.title: Organos de RPDC envian ofrendas florales a embajada de Cambodia
articles.content:
Organos de RPDC envian ofrendas florales a embajada de Cambodia
						
Pyongyang, 17 de octubre (ACNC) -- En memoria del gran rey de Cambodia, Norodom Sihanouk, las instituciones del partido y las fuerzas armadas, los ministerios, organos centrales y las organizaciones de masas enviaron el dia 17 las ofrendas florales a la embajada de Cambodia en Corea.
					Fueron depositadas ante la foto del monarca fallecido las ofrendas enviadas por el Departamento Internacional del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el de Seguridad del Pueblo, el de Deportes, el Comite Central de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea y la Direccion General de Servicios al Cuerpo Diplomatico.
					
					Estuvieron presentes en la ceremonia de homenaje Kim Jong Gak, Kim Yong Il y otros funcionarios coreanos.
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del difunto y dejaron letras en el libro de condolencias.

articles.title: Embajador cubano ofrece banquete por dia de fundacion del PTC
articles.content:
Embajador cubano ofrece banquete por dia de fundacion del PTC
						
Pyongyang, 17 de octubre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 67o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica de Cuba en Corea, German Hermin Ferras Alvarez, ofrecio este miercoles un banquete en su sede diplomatica.
					Fueron invitados a la ocasion Kim Yong Il, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del PTC, Pak Kun Gwang, subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, y otros funcionarios del CC del PTC.
					
					En su discurso, el embajador cubano subrayo que bajo la sabia direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, el pueblo coreano logra orgullosos exitos en la construccion de un Estado prospero y glorifica las imborrables hazanas revolucionarias del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Dijo que tambien en el futuro tambien, el pueblo cubano enviara el firme apoyo y solidaridad a la justa lucha del pueblo coreano.
					
					Destaco que se desarrollaran mas las relaciones de amistad entre los partidos y los pueblos de Cuba y Corea, forjadas bajo la profunda atencion de los lideres de los dos paises.
					
					En nombre del Partido Comunista y el gobierno de Cuba, deseo sinceramente el fortalecimiento constante del PTC.
					
					Al hacer uso de la palabra, Kim Yong Il senalo que el pueblo cubano lucha intensamente por materializar las resoluciones del VI Congreso del Partido Comunista de Cuba.
					
					Ratifico el firme apoyo y solidaridad a la justa lucha del partido y el pueblo de Cuba por defender la soberania del pais y las conquistas de la revolucion.
					
					Enfatizo que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises, preparadas por los camaradas Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y los companeros Fidel Castro Ruz y Raul Castro Ruz, se desarrollan favorablemente cada dia mas bajo la profunda atencion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Expreso la conviccion de que seran eternas las relaciones de amistad entre los dos partidos y los dos paises, establecidas en la lucha antiimperialista y antiyanqui y la comun por cumplir la causa socialista.
